title: A Study on Richard Steele's the conscious lovers as a sentimental comedy
abstract: This thesis is about a study of sentimental comedy by one of the greatest English playwrights,Sir Richard Steele entittled The Conscious Lovers (1722).The writer feels that this play is interesting to be discussed since this play is written through sentimentality and humor.Through this study the writer wants to find out what idea is con - veyed behind the humor and sentimentality elements of this play.In this play,Steele uses the main characters and also the minor ones to reveal the element of humor,senti - mentality,and also moral teaching.The characters are: Jack Bevil,Charles Myrtle,Indiana Denver,Lucinda Sealand, Sir John,Cimberton,Phillis,Tom,and Cimberton.Finally, at the end of this thesis,the writer can find out that Steele wants to convey morality or moral teaching to the audience.In other words,this play contains moral lessons behind the humor and sentimentality elements.And she can also find out the elements of humor,sentimentality,and moral teaching that are contained in this play.
contributors: Jenny Mochtar Djundjung (Examination Committee 1); ANTONIUS GURITO (Advisor 1)
subjects: ENGLISH LANGUAGE-19TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; STEELE, SIR RICHARD, 1672-1729. THE CONSCIOUS LOVERS-STUDY AND TEACHING
